name: Grocery Pandemic
description:
Grocery Pandemic is about a man named Mike going outside to buy some groceries during the pandemic but there are people who don't follow the rules during lockdown. 

Grocery Pandemic 20 Second Trailer

This is a game I made back when the Covid-19 pandemic started. It's also my first game that was released on Gamejolt. I hope you enjoy!

Instructions:
  • Left: Left arrow key
  • Right: Right arrow key
  • Jump: Up Arrow key
  • X: Interact
  • C: Shoot
  • V: Sanitize/Heal
